faqs.question: What type of septic system is best for Canton properties?
faqs.answer: The best system depends on your specific soil test results. Properties with adequate sandy loam may support conventional gravity systems, while clay-heavy lots may need low-pressure dosing or aerobic treatment units. We design each Canton installation based on actual site data rather than one-size-fits-all approaches.

faqs.question: Can you install a septic system on a small Canton lot?
faqs.answer: Yes, we install systems on smaller lots using space-efficient designs like drip irrigation drainfields or compact aerobic treatment units. Van Zandt County has minimum setback requirements from property lines, wells, and structures that we factor into every design. We work with challenging lot configurations regularly.
